title: Wendy Williams, DeNiro and more
itunes:title: Wendy Williams, DeNiro and more
description:
We open today's show with a little shade.  Yesterday was Chris Rock's birthday and the fellas talk about succeeding in comedy.  Wendy Williams is out and Nick Cannon is filling in and Wendy is being called a hypocrite.  Gucci is in hot water for blackface sweater and apologizes.  Robert DeNiro is going the divorce process and has a minor meltdown.  Delta Airlines and Coca Cola partnered together with a special napkin that failed.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog has a story he shares and reminds us that no matter who, we all are going through something.  Have a great weekend!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
